original_text: As a result, days of trouble will come to you. Your enemies will build a wall round you. They will shut you in completely, and they will not let you leave.
korean_text: 날이 이를지라 네 원수들이 토둔을 쌓고 너를 둘러 사면으로 가두고

sentences.original_text: As a result, days of trouble will come to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과로, 환난의 날들이 너에게 닥칠 것이다

sentences.original_text: Your enemies will build a wall round you
sentences.korean_translation: 네 원수들이 너를 둘러 성벽을 쌓을 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will shut you in completely
and they will not let you leave
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 너를 떠나지 못하게 할 것이다
